comments.author: Steve
comments.body:
Wow, this must be **the** most thoroughly researched Frenzy story of all time!

 Thanks, guys.

 -Steve, Gavarnie, FRANCE

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Happy birthday, Steve. Hope you're having a great time in BC.

comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Thanks Dave, for serving up a nice, steaming plate of Roast Bailey! Happy Birthday, Steve! We've been having Vancouver weather while you've been gone. That probably means you've been having Boulder weather out there.
